main event: A civilian observed a silver ball-like object maneuvering at a speed of 150 mph on 9 June 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a baseball held at arm's length,The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes,The sighting occurred in Sapulpa, Oklahoma,There were several similar sightings in the area around the same time,The reports suggest the sightings could be related to aircraft in the area.
